response.apiMessage: This XML was provided by Springer Nature

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.p: A seams, lens, or layer of ground ice, usually pure, formed by the drawing in of water to a growing ice crystal as the ground becomes frozen. Also sometimes referred to as segretation ice or sirlintype ice.
